name: serial-monitor-daemon
description: MCP Server for VS Code Serial Monitor Daemon - provides AI agents with persistent serial monitoring and data capture

tools.name: serial_daemon_start
tools.description: Start serial monitor daemon (persistent background service)

tools.name: serial_daemon_status
tools.description: Get daemon status (running, monitoring, port, uptime, lines captured)

tools.name: serial_daemon_connect
tools.description: Connect daemon to serial port and start monitoring

tools.name: serial_daemon_disconnect
tools.description: Disconnect from serial port (releases for other tools)

tools.name: serial_query
tools.description: Execute SQL query on captured serial data

tools.name: serial_recent
tools.description: Get recent serial data (last N seconds)

tools.name: serial_tail
tools.description: Get last N lines of serial data
